channel.title: How would i make a yellow whip
channel.description: yellow whip? whats the color id for it? ik how to add it to itemdef etc. i need a yellow thats solid

item.title: How would i make a yellow whip
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I’ll let you finish converting…

case 15125: itemDef.modelID = 2537; itemDef.name = "Gilded Santa"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelZoom = 670; itemDef.anInt165 = 189; itemDef.anInt200 = 366; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[2]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[2]; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 6073;//MESS WITH THIS itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 933; itemDef.originalModelColors[1] = 7099;//AND THIS Thanks now can we itemDef.modifiedModelColors[1] = 10351; break;

Read full topic
